description: While scouting, Anonsky spots an anomaly, prompting the team to set up camp for discussion. Despite Danila Matador's cautious approach, they decide to follow Anonsky's lead. The next day, they encounter an irradiated area, which Danila navigates safely. Sarik then detects a strong energy signature nearby, leading Anonsky to uncover a hidden artifact emitting strange sounds. As they examine it, Fanatic hears distant howls, prompting Danila to suggest they hurry back.
As they start back, %s spots mutant dogs approaching fast
%s fires a warning shot to scare the dogs
The dogs attack, %s and %s fight back fiercely
During the chaos, %s gets severely wounded
%s tries to help %s, but the situation worsens
The group retreats, leaving behind %s who is now beyond help
